resources.title: English
resources.string_add: Giphy Api Key. If you are going to use GIFs animation, you should register and get Api Key here https://developers.giphy.com/dashboard/?create=true
Which type to use: GIfs or Stickers (Stickers its are GIFs but with transparent background)
Content rating. More details you may find here https://developers.giphy.com/docs/optional-settings#rating
Display defined GIFs number in animation block
